moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bb5: I don't normally play the Ruy Lopez, but why not?  The opening is logical and allows white to castle quickly.
moves.4. O-O d5: Better are g6, d6.  I was expecting g6.  Without it, he's going to have a rough time castling kingside if he wants to.  Time to see how he handles pressure.
moves.5. Nxe5 dxe4: Somewhat expected though not too good.
moves.7... g6: He knew it was an illusion, but this is illusory too.  Qe6 is much better.
moves.8. Nxd5: It is always good to ask yourself, "What happens if I allow him to do what he wants to do?"
moves.8... gxh5: Bait taken.  White has a forced mate.
